title: got demoted from bronze 4 to 5 with 1lp before lose, i was told this cant happen
body: help me here, i won 5 straight in bronze 4 for only 21 points, i loose one and go to1 lp and lose again get demoted. can someone please explain? have they changed the rules. am about to give up on this game, it is so flawed currently..oce region doesnt even have a tribunal, both my loses were to afks and rage quits

replies.body:
Depends on your MMR. If you have high MMR, then games you win will give you more LP. If you have low MMR, then games you win give you less LP. Same thing vice versea.

Hope that helps.

thx horse, i do understand how mmr works i just thought u need to have 0 lps and loose a game to get demoted.everyone i have asked on this subject agrees with me. i still had 1lp when i lost and got demoted.

>i just thought u need to have 0 lps and loose a game to get demoted

Nope. It's based off of your MMR. Sometimes, I've had 0lp and lost three games in a row, but I wasn't demoted due to my abnormally high MMR. It's not a definitely rule.

I for one know that a promo can actually increase your division by two ranks instead of one.
